scene_description: A large warehouse with high shelves stocked with goods. Several workers are visible, moving around. A digital display in the upper left corner shows temperature readings. An elderly worker, Walt, is seen struggling, leaning on a cart, then bending over, and eventually collapsing to the floor. Other workers are present in the background.
safety_response: Immediately call for emergency medical services (911). Provide first aid to the collapsed worker, moving them to a cooler area if possible and applying cooling measures. Investigate the cause of the high temperature in the warehouse (indicated as 90Â°F) and implement immediate controls to reduce heat stress for all workers, such as improved ventilation, air conditioning, mandatory breaks, and hydration stations. Monitor other workers for signs of heat-related illness.
